entry.title: Blog Reboot
entry.content:
My old personal blog had been a bit neglected, especially since I did most of the software-related posts on my work blog. That blog is probably going to continue to get the majority of my blogging energy (such as it is) but I thought it might be interesting to have a place to post about non-software topics as well.

This kitten has absolutely nothing to do with the blog but I read somewhere that people are 43.5% more likely to bookmark a site with a cute picture. Image courtesy of Place Kitten
